entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who has come to visit someone in the hospital. He is accompanied by another person (not specified) and they are trying to be discreet about their visit.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is a person who works at the hospital as a Healer. He is leading Ron and his companion through the corridors.

entities.name: healer
entities.description: The Healer is a person who works with Lockhart at the hospital. She is smiling expectantly at Ron and his companion.

relationships.description: Ron is accompanying Lockhart through the corridors of the hospital.
The Healer is leading Ron and his companion through the corridors.
